response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer with experience in management and leadership of Oil & Gas Projects. Universidad Nacional de Colombia / Master on Numerical Methods in Engineering - Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya
response.summary:
I am a Mechanical Engineer graduated in 2017 from the National University of Colombia, which allowed me to grow as a student and as a person; Once my undergraduate experience finished, I started working in a small company which allowed me to cover a wide range of activities as an engineer such as the CAD / CAE design of metal structures, continuous review of production processes in the plant, process assurance quality, among others, so I was able to experience many variables for my professional future.
From this, I managed to get my last job as a project manager, in this company I consolidated my leadership skills, personnel management, internal process logistics, in addition to understanding the entire design process of thermal equipment and pressure vessels following standards such as the ASME Code and the Tubular Exchanger Manufacturers Association TEMA.
All this experience allows me to have a strategic vision, as well as a more open mind to express and transmit ideas within a metalworking design and production process and to be able to complement any work team.
 I think that motivation in carrying out any activity can lead to unimaginable things, and my previous experience confirms that I will be able to take my work to new companies without any problem, providing all the energy possible to obtain all the objectives set.
response.skills: Manufactura, Negociación, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Gestión de proyectos, Matlab, Ingeniería, Microsoft Word, Inglés, Microsoft Power BI, Python, C++, Industria petrolera, Industria del petróleo y del gas

profile_positions.description:
Internship carried out as part of the Master in Numerical Methods in Engineering at the UPC.
Main objectives:
-Search for information corresponding to research on fatigue in composite materials, especially in carbon fiber reinforced polymers (CFRP).
-Identification of mechanical properties of CFRP composites through the use of experimental and computational tests (Using software such as GiD & Kratos Multiphysics).
-Realization of static and dynamic simulations in CFRP.
-Extension with final master's project in verification of fatigue behavior in composite materials and life estimation under fatigue phenomenon.
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for monitoring Oil & Gas projects in activities in the areas of detailed engineering, international purchasing, manufacturing and dispatch.
Follow-up of engineering specifications established in international standards such as the ASME Code and Tubular Exchanger Manufacturers Association TEMA.
Main Projects: -Change of Superheater - Boiler 39 MW - Termopaipa GENSA (Manufacture and installation of all equipment, approximate weight 85 tons)
-Change of tubes of Convection Bank, Unity III & IV - Termozipa EMGESA (Manufacture and installation of all equipment, approximate weight 180 tons)
- Design and manufacture of Hydrocyclone + Skid - National Oilwell Varco (NOV), approximate weight 40 tons.
- Design and manufacture of Riser - ECOPETROL, approximate weight 80 tons. 
- Design and manufacture of boilers, heat exchangers and pressure vessels (Main client: ECOPETROL)
profile_positions.title: Project Scheduler

profile_positions.description:
Head of Engineering for the design and manufacture of projects related to metal structures, thermal insulation systems, among others.
Responsible for the CAD / CAE design of metalworking elements for bus adaptation, material calculations for series production lines, quality assurance and manufacturing process control.
 Main Projects: - Design, manufacture and assembly of a warehouse approx. 500 m2 in Sociedad Puerto Industrial Aguadulce - Buenaventura, Colombia.
- Total roofing installation using sandwich panel (1600 m2) in Colegio Paulo VI - Bogotá Colombia.
- Design and detailed engineering of bus seats, internal bus structures, among others.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

education.degree_name: Master on Numerical Methods in Engineering

company.name: BACHILLER
company.description:
BACHILLER is an industrial engineering company specialized in the design and construction of process equipment and pressure vessels for the chemical, petrochemical, fine chemical, pharmaceutical, cosmetic and food industries.

We provide solutions in pressure filtration, mixing and reaction of liquids and pastes, mixing, reaction and granulation of solids, vacuum drying, columns, tanks and pressure equipment, heat exchangers and reactors.

PRESSURE FILTERS
Nutsche Filters
Nutsche Filter Dryers

VACUUM DRYERS
Horizontal Vacuum Paddle Dryers
Vertical Vacuum Dryers
Vacuum Dryers Reactor for Solids

SOLID MIXERS
Vertical Mixers
Horizontal Mixers

LIQUID PROCESSING SYSTEMS
Liquid Mixers and Reactors
CIP Systems
Colloid Mills
Vacuum Deareators

AGITATED REACTORS

STATIC EQUIPMENT
Heat Exchangers
Distillation Columns
Pressure Vessels

Our services include project design, manufacturing of the equipment, laboratory tests, quality control and after sales.

We are present in more than 25 countries, directly or through our extensive network of representatives and local partners.

Spanish company founded in 1971. Our headquarter, manufacturing workshops and pilot plant are located in Parets del Vallés, 20 km from Barcelona. We have two production centers totaling more than 9,000m2.

QUALITY AND CERTIFICATIONS
Experience, investment in R & D & I and our high quality standards endorse us as world leaders. We have the quality certifications ISO 9001: 2008, U and U2 seal of ASME, HP0 certificate according to AD-2000 Merkblätt, Module H1 according to PED and A2 license according to SQL of the People's Republic of China.
